column4: They sent me the disks all nice and shiney along with stickers

Edgy is not beta, it is a full release. but it has a lot of experimental stuff, and should only be used by those willing to live on the bleeding edge and pick scabs.

i love my girlfriend. she loves a roof and food. you do the math. :)
